snippet.title: Hot Wheels Jetz (2001) | Campaign Full Playthrough
snippet.description:
There are few videos about this game, and the gameplay videos that do exist are recordings of screens rather than screen capture.

I replayed mission 3 at the end because I missed a bonus ring. I also play through free play because it's essentially a mission of its own. Also, I very clearly forgot to raise the landing gear. I don't know why I didn't notice that while playing lol

This was recorded via the TV output (7-pin S-Video) of a Compaq Presario C301NR running Windows XP and using a Dazzle DVC 100 Rev 1.1 as the capture device and VirtualDub2 as the capture software. Unfortunately, this was the easiest way to record this game, as it doesn't run well on newer versions of Windows.
